com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.sql

Interface DatabaseOperationOperations

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatabaseOperationOperationsImpl

    public interface DatabaseOperationOperations
    The Azure SQL Database Management API includes operations for getting database operations. Specifically, this API allows you to get a specific operation, or to list all the operations that happened on a specific database or on all databases in the Azure SQL Database Server.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DatabaseOperationGetResponse get(java.lang.String serverName, java.lang.String operationGuid)
      Returns information about a specific operation by using the operation Guid.
      java.util.concurrent.Future<DatabaseOperationGetResponse> getAsync(java.lang.String serverName, java.lang.String operationGuid)
      Returns information about a specific operation by using the operation Guid.
      DatabaseOperationListResponse listByDatabase(java.lang.String serverName, java.lang.String databaseName)
      Retrieves all of the operations that took place on a specific database.
      java.util.concurrent.Future<DatabaseOperationListResponse> listByDatabaseAsync(java.lang.String serverName, java.lang.String databaseName)
      Retrieves all of the operations that took place on a specific database.
      DatabaseOperationListResponse listByServer(java.lang.String serverName)
      Retrieves all of the operations that occured on the Azure SQL Database Server.
      java.util.concurrent.Future<DatabaseOperationListResponse> listByServerAsync(java.lang.String serverName)
      Retrieves all of the operations that occured on the Azure SQL Database Server.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        DatabaseOperationGetResponse get(java.lang.String serverName,
                               java.lang.String operationGuid)
                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                        ServiceException,
                                        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Returns information about a specific operation by using the operation Guid.
        Parameters:
        serverName - Required. The name of the Azure SQL Database Server where the database is hosted.
        operationGuid - Required. The Guid of the Azure SQL Database operation to be obtained.
        Returns:
        Represents the database operation for a given operation Guid.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.
        ServiceException - Thrown if an unexpected response is found.
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - Thrown if there was a serious configuration error with the document parser.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - Thrown if there was an error parsing the XML response.

      • listByDatabase

        DatabaseOperationListResponse listByDatabase(java.lang.String serverName,
                                           java.lang.String databaseName)
                                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                                    ServiceException,
                                                    javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                                    org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Retrieves all of the operations that took place on a specific database.
        Parameters:
        serverName - Required. The name of the Azure SQL Database Server that hosts the database.
        databaseName - Required. The name of the database for which the operations should be retrieved.
        Returns:
        Represents the response containing the list of database operations for a given server or database.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.
        ServiceException - Thrown if an unexpected response is found.
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - Thrown if there was a serious configuration error with the document parser.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - Thrown if there was an error parsing the XML response.
